Comment: >why invest all that energy passion into making things better? Why regurgitate propaganda so enthusiastically?  Mostly because I wanted people to have the good too. There's a lot of fear for the Democrats, and it feels bad to have them be afraid. I listened to the news from CNN and MSNBC, and it just riles people to think they're not safe or that good things aren't happening. It must be really scary. They don't offer the other side.  So - witnessing? Not in the Christian sense. I wanted to reach out and give things that people might relate to. I didn't vote for Trump three times because I believed that all that press and louder friends couldn't be wrong. I started to pay attention, and I realized he's really doing good things that should help the country. He intends to. I agree with the intentions. Let me find something. There was a list. He's truly imperfect as a politician, but I think what's happening could ultimately be really good for all of us.
Author: lady__jane
